About

Built on Reliable, Quality Work

Dam Good Landscaping is a solo operation — just me, Dave, and the work I put into every yard I touch. No large crews, no corners cut, no jobs handed off to someone you never met.

Photo coming soon

The Story

I grew up taking care of my family's property in Greenville. Mowing, trimming, hauling — it was just part of life. Over the years I picked up more skills and started helping neighbors out on the side. Eventually people started asking me to do the same for them, and Dam Good Landscaping was born.

I am not trying to be the biggest landscaping company in SC. I am trying to be the most reliable one in your neighborhood. That means showing up when I say I will, doing the work I promised, and leaving the property cleaner than I found it.

Every job gets my full attention because every job has my name on it.

What I Offer

  • Lawn maintenance — mowing, edging, blowing
  • Mulching and bed edging
  • Shrub trimming and shaping
  • Full yard cleanups and debris removal
  • Seasonal work — spring and fall prep

My Approach

I look at the whole property before I quote anything. I want to understand what is going on before I give you a number. That way there are no surprises when the job is done — for either of us.

I document projects with before and after photos because I am proud of the work and I want you to have a record of what was done. It also holds me accountable. If I can't take a good after photo, I am not done.

Service Area

Based in Greenville, SC — serving the surrounding area. Not sure if I cover your neighborhood? Just ask. If it is reasonable, I will make it work.

Hours

Mon–Sat 7am–6pm

What You Can Count On

I Show Up

If we schedule a time, I am there. Reliability is the whole game in this business.

Fair Prices

I charge for what the job actually takes. No inflated estimates, no mystery fees.

Clean Work

I haul away what I cut. The yard looks better when I leave than when I arrived.

Honest Quotes

I will tell you what your yard needs — and what it does not need. No upselling.

Responsive

I answer texts and calls. If I miss one, I call back the same day.

Before & After Docs

I photograph every project. You get a clear record of the work done.

Let's Talk About Your Yard

Ready to get started? Reach out and I will come take a look — no charge. Serving the Greater Greenville, SC area.
